1111100001001111 0010101110011100 1 -> sum: 0010001111101100, cout: 1
0101010000001110 0011101011001000 1 -> sum: 1000111011010111, cout: 0
1110110000000010 0001101011111100 1 -> sum: 0000011011111111, cout: 1
1000011110010011 0010010101011011 0 -> sum: 1010110011101110, cout: 0
1001111100110010 0011001001000011 0 -> sum: 1101000101110101, cout: 0
0010000101011010 0000001110100100 1 -> sum: 0010010011111111, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000000 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
